```{r load data}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
library(ggplot2)
library(sf)

rider_23 <- read.csv("ridership_2023.csv")
```

```{r data cleaning}
date <- c("dtBookingStart", "dtWeekStart", "dtDate", "dtMonthYear")
rider_23 <- rider_23 %>% mutate(across(all_of(date), as.Date))
```
